Uses of Interface
com.gemstone.gemfire.cache.client.ClientRegionFactory

  • Packages that use ClientRegionFactory 
    Package Description
    com.gemstone.gemfire.cache.client
    The com.gemstone.gemfire.cache.client package provides APIs used for client connectivity and caching.

    • Uses of ClientRegionFactory in com.gemstone.gemfire.cache.client

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Adds a cache listener to the end of the list of cache listeners on this factory.

      Create and return a client region factory that is initialized to create a region using the given named region attributes.
